## Steps to run the main.sh script
- Extract the folder
- move the bgp-routing-table.txt file in this folder
- Open Terminal in that folder
- chmod +x main.sh
- Run `./main.sh`
- Outup will look like.

    --------------------------------------------------

    - Number of Unique AES are:  48237
